import React,{useState}from'react';import{addBusinessTrip}from'../services/api';// Komponente zum Hinzufügen einer Geschäftsreise
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddBusinessTrip=()=>{const[destination,setDestination]=useState('');const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[date,setDate]=useState('');const destinations=["New York","San Francisco","Chicago","Los Angeles","Miami"];const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const newTrip={destination,name,email,date};addBusinessTrip(newTrip).then(()=>{setDestination('');setName('');setEmail('');setDate('');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Gesch\xE4ftsreise hinzuf\xFCgen"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:destination,onChange:e=>setDestination(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select Destination"}),destinations.map((dest,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:dest,children:dest},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Trip"})]});};export default AddBusinessTrip;
